gurmukhi: ਸਾਧ ਕੀ ਸੁਜਨਤਾੲੀ ਪਾਹਨ ਕੀ ਰੇਖ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਬੈਰ ਜਲ ਰੇਖ ਹੁੲਿ ਬਿਸੇਖ ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗ ਮੈ
transliteration: Saadh Kee Sujanataaee Paahan Kee Raykh Preeti , Bair Jal Raykh Hui Bisaykh Saadh Sang Mai ?
translation: The loving relationship of Guru-oriented persons is like a line drawn on stone slab and is indelible. That is, the significance of company of Guru oriented persons is, that there is no ill feeling or animosity.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਜਨਤਾ ਅਸਾਧ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਜਲ ਰੇਖ ਅਰੁ ਬੈਰੁ ਤੳੁ ਪਾਖਾਨ ਰੇਖ ਸੇਖ ਅੰਗ ਅੰਗ ਮੈ
transliteration: Durajanataa Asaadh Preeti Jal Raykh Aru , Bairu Tau Paakhaan Raykh Saykh Ang Ang Mai ?
translation: Love of self oriented persons is momentary like a line drawn on water while their enmity remains like a line on a stone slab. It becomes part of their limb.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਸਟ ਅਗਨਿ ਗਤਿ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਬਿਪਰੀਤਿ ਸੁਰਸਰੀ ਜਲ ਬਾਰੁਨੀ ਸਰੂਪ ਜਲ ਗੰਗ ਮੈ
transliteration: Kaasat Agani Gati Preeti Bipareeti , Surasaree Jal Baarounee Saroop Jal Gang Mai ?
translation: The love of Guru-oriented persons is like that of wood which keeps the fire hidden in it whereas that of self-willed persons is contrary to it. Pure water of river Ganges when mixed with wine becomes polluted but when wine is mixed with the water of river

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਅਜਯਾ ਸਰਪ ਗਤਿ ੳੁਪਕਾਰੀ ਅੳੁ ਬਿਕਾਰੀ ਢੰਗ ਹੀ ਕੁਢੰਗ ਮੈ ||੨੯੭||
transliteration: Duramati Gurmati Ajayaa Sarap Gati , Oupakaaree Au Bikaaree Ddhang Hee Kuddhang Mai ?297?
translation: A person with base and impure mind is like a snake who commits evil due to its bad trait. It is always ready to harm. But a Guru-oriented person is like a goat which is always ready to do a good deed. (297)
